item.title: It's Actually The Way You Say
item.description: Brothers, In communication, especially with women, the gesture and the body language are much more important than the thing we say. Many, many times more. Do you know that, in reality, body language comprises up to 93% of the communication power, while the message is just little 7%. Yes, that is true. Body language is the key factor deciding a winner or loser, not the message my friend. So, what does body language comprise of?
